game.name: Train Simulator: Ruhr-Sieg Route Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Ruhr-Sieg line is a wonderful German route that includes passenger and freight trains and a choice of diesel, electric and steam locomotives.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Ruhr-Sieg line is a wonderful German route that includes passenger and freight trains and a choice of diesel, electric and steam locomotives.
